headline: PUTIN'S TELEGRAM TROLLS 🕵️‍♂️📱 RECRUITING UKRAINIAN KIDS 👶💣 to BLOW UP THEIR OWN HOMELAND 😱💥 – SABOTAGE SIMPS GO BRRRR 🔥🚫
text:
YO WHAT THE ACTUAL F*CK 🤯💢 RUSSIA'S GOON SQUAD 🐻🇷🇺 dropping BOMBSHELLS 💣📱 on TELEGRAM, turning UKRAINIAN TEENS 🧒😩 into SABOTAGE SIMPS 🤡🔥! Ukrainian gov spilling the TEA ☕🇺🇦: HUNDREDS of KIDS 👦👧, some as YOUNG as 9-10 😱🍼, getting RECRUITED online for CASH GRABS 💰🤑 to PLANT BOMBS 💥🚗 at ARMY DRAFT VANS 🚌💸 and POLICE STATIONS 👮‍♂️🚫! SBU security bros 🕵️‍♂️⚡ say OVER 800 SABOTEURS busted in 2 YEARS 📅🔥, 240 MINORS going FULL VILLAIN ARC 🦹‍♂️😈 – from HOUSEHOLD CHEM GOO 💧🧪 to MOLOTOV PARTIES 🍹💨!

MEET VLAD 👦🔥 (name changed cuz OPSEC 🕶️), 17yo EASTERN UKR BOI who ROAD-TRIPPED 500 MILES 🛣️💨 to RIVNE PARK 🌳🪨 for a HIDDEN BOMB + PHONE 📱💣 PROMISED $2K 🤑💵 to FRY a CONSCRIPTION VAN 🚐🔥! 'Wiring it up, thought I'd GO BOOM 😵💥 myself,' he spills to BBC 🎤📺. Handler ROMAN 🧔🇷🇺 with that STREET RUSSIAN ACCENT 🗣️😤 wanted LIVE-STREAM DETO 📹💥 for remote KABOOM when draft bros hop in! But SBU SAID 'NOT TODAY SATAN' 🚫🛡️, busted him – now 18yo VLAD chilling in MAX-SECURITY JAIL ⛓️😢 awaiting 12YR TERROR RAP SHEET 📜⚖️. 'Nobody likes draft officers 😤🚫,' he shrugs, but admits COULD'VE KILLED PPL 💀😱!

SBU TEA ☕🔥: RECRUITMENT on TELEGRAM CHANNELS 📱👥, TIKTOK DANCES 💃📹, even VIDEO GAMES 🎮🕹️ – targeting VULNERABLE NOOBS 🧠🤤 who DON'T GET the BODY COUNT CONSEQUENCES 💀📈! Cyber QUEEN ANASTASIIA APETYK 👩‍💻🛡️ says they HIT 9YOS 😲🍼, while POLICE DEPUTY ANDRII NEBYTOV 🧑‍✈️🚔 calls it DELIBERATE KID MANIP 🧸🎭. MOTIVE? STRAIGHT CASH 💵🤑, not Putin fanboying 🐻❤️ – VLAD says 'NO RUSSY LUV, just REMOTE GIG HUNT' 👀💼!

VLAD'S QUEST LOG 📜🎮: Joined TELEGRAM 'JOBS' CHATS 📱💼, ROMAN HIT UP in 30MIN ⏱️, started with GRENADE FETCH QUEST 🧨🗺️ (GONE WRONG, still $30 bag 🤑), then ARSON VAN BBQ 🔥🚐 for $100 CRYPTO 📈₿ (promised $1.5K Ls 😭). NEXT LVL: RIVNE BOMB DROP 💣🌆! Channels PUMP ANTI-DRAFT RAGE 😡🚌 with UNVERIFIED FIRE/BOOM CLIPS 🔥💥📹 – BBC undercover burner phone OP 🕵️📱 got PRICE LIST 🛒💰: $1.5K POST OFFICE TORCH 🏤🔥, $3K BANK HEIST cuz SECURITY GLASS = EXTRA SPICY 🏦💎, 'POUR PETROL or MOLOTOV COCKTAILS 🍹💨 INSIDE BITCH!' 😂🤑. Even BEAUTY TIPS GROUPS 💅📱 and REFUGEE CHATS 🏃‍♂️🇺🇦 dropping SABOTAGE ADS 🚨💼 – 'NEED ALL THE ARSON 👑🔥, PAY FAST after VID PROOF 📹✅!'

TELEGRAM MODS? SLEEPING ON THE JOB 😴🚫 – BBC SNITCHED, they NUKED a FEW but MOST STILL LIVE 📈👻, one CHANNEL GAINED 750 SIMPS since 😏📈! TG says 'NO VIOLENCE VIBES' 🙄 but WINK WINK. EURO GOVS spilling: RUSSIA RECRUITING YOUNG DUDES for ARSON/SPY SHENAN 👀🇪🇺, UK JAILLED 6 for LONDON WAREHOUSE TORCH aiding UKR 🚒🏭! In UKR, SABOTEURS DROPPING LIKE FLIES 💀💥 – HANDLERS REMOTE DETO KIDS 🧒☠️, like MARCH 17yo BOOMED + 15yo MANGLED at TRAIN STATION 🚂💣!

RUSSY EMBASSY CLAPBACK 🤡📢: 'UKR DOES IT TOO, KID RECRUITMENT TRADEMARK 🍼💣!' But VLAD'S FINAL BOSS MESSAGE 🎤⚠️: 'DON'T BE DUMBASS 🤦‍♂️⛓️ – THEY CHEAT YA 💸😭, JAIL YA 🚔, or BOOM YA 💥☠️!' PUTIN'S TELEGRAM TROLL ARMY 🕵️‍♂️📱 turning UKR KIDS into MEAT SHIELDS 🥩🛡️ – STAY WOKE, DON'T GET RECRUITED INTO THIS SH*TSTORM 🌪️💀! 😤🇺🇦🚀
